According to who? What constitutes hate speech? I just said the word with no weight or ill will behind it. Is saying harlot hate speech, what about peasant

The word is still offensive in any context and I'm supposing you used the "er" format which is even more derogatory. Even if you had no ill-intent, it's still highly offensive to others and could cause an offense. It also is not a word to be carelessly thrown around if you were educated on it in school.

In addition, you should know better and think about what you say and the environment you say it in. Children do play this game and we want a better environment for them. You had no reason to use that word but excessively decided to state it, hence you were restricted instead. To me, that's Riot being lenient.

That game you didn't swear, say any racial or homophobic slurs and all your insults were a comeback. Riot please this guy is innocent.
